terraswap.name: Terraswap
terraswap.description: A decentralized protocol for seamless access to asset liquidity on Terra.

metaFrens.description: MetaFrens is a community-led NFT metaverse open for all Terra NFTs.

terraCasino.name: Terra Casino
terraCasino.description: No. 1 casino for Terra, you bet, we burn. Providing 3000+ games: slots, live casino, sports.

anchorProtocol.name: Anchor Protocol
anchorProtocol.description: Fixed yield platform with borrowing yields. Anchor offers frictionless access. Anchor savings has no minimum deposits, account freezes, or signup requirements - it can be used by anyone in the world with access to the internet.

mirrorProtocol.name: Mirror Protocol
mirrorProtocol.description: Mirror Protocol allows the creation of fungible assets, “synthetics”, that track the price of real world assets.

talis.name: Talis
talis.description: The NFT marketplace that empowers artists and bridges physical & digital art on the Cosmos ecosystem.

apolloDao.name: Apollo DAO
apolloDao.description: Apollo DAO is building the necessary apps and infrastructure to securely manage assets and optimize yield across the Cosmos ecosystem.

spectrumProtocol.name: Spectrum Protocol
spectrumProtocol.description: Spectrum Protocol is an Innovative, Decentralized Yield Optimizer platform that allows users to earn compound interest on their crypto assets farming.

loopMarkets.name: Loop Markets
loopMarkets.description: Loop DEX is the first AMM (automatic market maker) on Terra.

prismProtocol.name: Prism Protocol
prismProtocol.description: PRISM is a revolutionary derivatives protocol that introduces new asset classes in DeFi, allowing users to manage the risks associated with volatile prices and unstable yields in a simple and capital-efficient manner.

erisProtocol.name: Eris Protocol
erisProtocol.description: ERIS is a Liquid Staking and Slow-burn Arbitrage Protocol.

lns.name: LNS
lns.description: Your .luna & .lunc name service. Own your username, store an avatar and other profile data, and use it across Terra 2.0 & Terra Classic.
